item.title: Help with NPC/Player Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Problem: Compiles, no errors. I click the npc, it only sends me one dialogue.

My firstclicknpc method with npc already on it.

		if(NpcID == 0)
			{
			c.NpcDialogue = 1;
			c.Ds();
			}

My Dialogue Method

public void Ds()
    {
        switch(NpcDialogue)
        {
			
	 case 1: 
            sendFrame200(4883, 591);
            sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
            sendFrame126("Hello, does this work?", 4885);
            sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886);
            sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
            sendFrame164(4882);
            break;

        case 2:
            sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
            sendFrame126("Yes", 2461);
            sendFrame126("No", 2462);
            sendFrame164(2459);
            break;

        default:
            break;
	}
}

I have no idea how to make it perform the second dialogue after clicking “click here to continue”.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 01:10:03 PM[/size][hr]wat

Read full topic
